name: Advertising Association
goal: To promote the role, rights, and responsibilities of advertising. The AA brings together agencies, brands and media to seek consensus on the issues and opportunities that affect them.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Advertising policy
Audiovisual and media policy
Better Regulation agenda
Co and self-regulation initiatives
Consumer affairs
Data protection and privacy laws
Digital Single Market
E-commerce
Public health, including EU Alcohol Strategy
